content: is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com slip_stitch in ea st around hhhhaaaannnnddddlllleeee row 1 attach same color to the side with the sl sts slip_stitch a loop around a single_crochet post between rnds 3 & 4 chain 10 slip_stitch across from first slip_stitch around a single_crochet post between round 3 & 4 to form the handle row 2 chain 1 single_crochet 25 around the 10 chs 25 sts fasten_off weave in ends bbbbiiiinnnnkkkkyyyy ppppaaaarrrrtttt round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3-4 single_crochet around round 5 single_crochet decrease around 8 sts round 6-7 single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff the binky use the yarn needle to sew the binky to the opposite side of the base weave in ends all done enjoy your baby doll accessories this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com
